column4: holding down the backspace key no longer works in my terminal in Feisty, any ideas?
it used to backspace through everything while holding it down, now it doesn't
try del.  if that works, stty erase ^h
nope, delete just makes my computer beep, nothing gets erased.
the backspace doesn'
x-chat, the arrow key doesn't even go more than once?
i just put new batteries in the wireless keyboard too? plus it doesn
hmm, sounds like your keyboard's not working too hot.
it doesn't work over ssh either.
the only reason I don't suspect the keyboard is because it doesn't work over ssh.
within the putty
i meant just "putty" sshing into my box
it sickens me to say thins, but when's the last time you rebooted?
uptime shows 19:29:39 up 28 days,  9:03,  3 users,  load average: 4.31, 4.00, 2.82
it's a mythtv and ssh server.
two issues, that 4.7 load may slow down your keyboard, and second, did you just update the kerel?
4.7 load is because of using makedvd -burn from tovid an no I didn't just install new kernel. still using  2.6.20-17-generic
anything change before your keyboard went wonky?
not that I am aware of. I don't even get updates anymore because I am still using Feisty.
i gotta go, thanks for trying to help.
well, something presumably has changed, if you cna find that, and undo it, you may be back
